data.meta_description: The Award is run by a small dedicated team of full-time staff. We are a resource for participants, families, schools and anyone interested in learning about the program.
data.meta_site_name: The Congressional Award - United States Congress' Highest Honor for Youth Civilians
data.text:
Leadership

National office

WHO ARE WE?

The Congressional Award is run by a small dedicated team of full-time staff. We are a resource for participants, families, schools and anyone interested in learning more about The Congressional Award.
